description: seamonkey. i have used for long time ago since 1999 or so on and the best is its mail and composer included... i loved it

I thought I left unwanted downloads behind with windows. SeaMonkey browser installed unwanted mail client and website creation software. What's worse they would not uninstall cleanly via the gnome GUI. I uninstalled the mail client which resulted in errors, the other two programs would not uninstall and their icons became persistent, returning over and over after being deleted. SHAME, SHAME.
Ставится с почтовым клиентом и вылазит из каждой щели
